item.title: YuanPad 1.1 is now available
item.description:
This release fixes some bugs against version 1.0.

Here is the list:

  • Fixed bug #2 (code highlight bug)
  • Fixed bug #3 (Code snippet parsed as smilies)
  • Fixed bug #7 (The comment form looks weird in IE6)

The admin user will be logged in automatically after the installation finished in this release.

Click here to get it.

Thank you for using YuanPad.
item.dc:creator: rainyjune

item.title: YuanPad 1.0 released
item.description:
YuanPad is a simple and powerful PHP guestbook and is the successor to MapleLeaf.

I am glad to announce that the first version of YuanPad released, this release is based on MapleLeaf 2.0 Beta which released on September 17th, 2011.

New Features introduced in MapleLeaf 2.0 Beta

  • Added search support.
  • Added Multiple-database support(add mysql,mysqli,sqlite support).
  • Added allowable tags support.
  • Added API support.
  • Added RSS support.
  • Added code highlight support.
  • Added user management support.

This project is hosted on Google Code, feel free to check out the latest project source code. The release package can be found on http://code.google.com/p/yuan-pad/downloads/list

Tags:

  • YuanPad
item.dc:creator: rainyjune
